content.rendered:
AqualisBraemar and OWC presented their combined capabilities at a floating offshore wind turbine showcase event in Aberdeen.

Martin Brown and Stuart Mill of AqualisBraemar, and John Macaskill of OWC manned the stand at the EIC’s Floating Offshore Wind Turbine (FOWT) showcase in Aberdeen last Thursday, September 6th. This exciting event brought together over 100 delegates to learn about future prospects for floating offshore wind turbines.

From left to right: Martin Brown (Managing Director at AqualisBraemar Aberdeen), Stuart Mill (Group Commercial Director) and John MacAskill (Director at OWC).

The event highlighted the worldwide long-term potential of the market and the need for sharing knowledge between wind developers and offshore specialists. This echoes the combined skills that AqualisBraemar and OWC bring to floating offshore wind projects. During the panel session, some interesting questions were asked. Such topics included mooring redundancy, safe access for inspection and repair for developments, consisting of multiple floating offshore wind turbines, and how to change out major components such as blades and gearboxes.

Learn more about our services.

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, Aqualis ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 912
Email: kim.boman@aqualis.no

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About Aqualis ASA

Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers energy consultancy services to the offshore oil, gas and renewables sectors globally. The group employs experienced consultants across 18 offices in 14 countries worldwide. Aqualis ASA operates under two different brands: AqualisBraemar and Offshore Wind Consultants. AqualisBraemar is a specialised offshore marine and engineering consultancy firm, focusing on the shallow and deep-water offshore segments of the oil and gas industry. Offshore Wind Consultants is a globally focused consultancy providing independent services to the offshore renewables industry.
